title: X Games Brazil Victory - Speed Leads Fiesta Podium Sweep
description: The 2013 Global Rallycross Championship kicked off at X Games Brazil, and Scott Speed, driver of the Fiesta "Star Car," was the surprise winner.   Speed led a Ford sweep of the podium and a 1-2-3-4-5 Fiesta finish in the exciting race.
